body.name: DATO 1TB Portable SSD, ARES Torch External SSD, Up to 1050/1000 MB/s, USB 3.2 Gen 2x1 Type C Super Light & Compact Portable Solid State Drive
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 11 hrs 6 mins
features: ONLY 25 GRAMS: With only the weight of 5 grapes and the size of a credit card, you can save your photos, memories and documents and bring them with you in your pockets easily
LIGHTNING FAST: Pocket-sized as it is, the performance is not trimmed down at all. With its speed up to 1050/1000MB/s, this can be handy anywhere, anytime
THERMAL SENSORING : Offers smart monitoring on your SSD temperature via our Thermal Throttling Technology to ensure butter-smooth user experience

OTG TRANSFER: Experience butter-smooth data transfer and backup from any Type C devices supporting OTG Transfer including tablets and Type C cellphones and more. Comes with a Type C to A Cable (10Gb/s)
3 YEAR WARRANTY: Deeply valuing your user experience and having faith in our quality, we offer a limited 3 year warranty for our TORCH Portable SSD series
COMPATIBILITY: If you're not sure if it's compatible with your device, please slide in a message for compatibility consultation

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 28 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TINY but MIGHTY How small can a portable SSD be? Why get a bulky hard drive when you can get it at the size of approximately your bluetooth earphones? The ARES TORCH Portable SSD is just 25 grams (lighter than your bunch of keys), and even smaller than your credit card. Small as it is, the read/write speed is still a competitive 1050 MB/s and 1000 MB/s, making it your most handy portable storage to bring around daily and during travels.

OTG Transfer Supported Are you sick of waiting for your photos and videos to transfer from your cellphone to your computer, then to your external hard drive? The ARES TORCH Portable SSD not only connects directly to your computer, but also you cellphone and tablets! This portable SSD supports OTG Transfer, which provides direct data transfer and backup from any Type C devices. Thoughtful as we are, we packed in a Type A to Type C cable to save down the time of getting a transfer cable for your computer too. You're welcome :)

Thermal Throttling Technology Aside from its decent speed, compact size, feather-like weight and handy OTG Transfer services, We also implemented smart temperature monitoring technologies to prevent your portable SSD from getting overheated. Experience butter-smooth data transfer experience anytime, anywhere.

Amber Shield Ares Torch Portable ✓ ✓ Main Feature Rugged Tiny & Light Read/Write Speed Up to 1600/1500 MB/s Up to 1050/1000 MB/s OTG Transfer ✓ ✓ Water Resistance ✓ 4 Feet Free Fall Test ✓ Shockproof ✓ ✓ Dustproof ✓ ✓ Cross Cutting Test (Anti-scratch) ✓ Thermal Control ✓ ✓

What Else Do We Have In Store? Premium SSD for Gamers and Creators We offer internal solid state drives of all interfaces and form factors, from M.2 2230, 2242 to 2280, across PCIe Gen3x4 and PCIe Gen 4x4. Designed for gamers, professionals and creators, we proudly provide reliable support for all of your gaming experiences and creative works. Diamond Glazed and Blazing Fast RAMs Experience premium upgrade effortlessly and break the limits with us. We offer premium quality DDR4 computer memory of all purposes, for laptops, for PCs and desktops, and for gamers. The Smallest Portable SSD Ever to be How small can a 2TB storage device be? This one fits easily between your thumb and your index finger, and only weighs a ridiculously light weight of 25 grams. Supported with OTG transfer, you can back up your photos and videos directly from your phone to the portable SSD without passing through a computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little portable drive!
reviews.reviewText: Meets the cute factor as it is itty bitty, cute, functional and practical. Holds a decent amount of data, great for connecting to cars for song storage, video files for sharing at work and on other computers, looks great with the black and white color combination, comes with a cable, useful, resourceful, would replace/buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Drive for the Money
reviews.reviewText: This is a compact little drive, not blazing fast DTR, but for the price that is to be expected. It is definitely a cool, small, lightweight little piece of tech.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My games downloaded to the SSD run so much faster
reviews.reviewText: I save all of my main games to the SSD and they run so much faster and smoother.One of the standout features of the ARES Torch is its impressive data transfer speeds. With read and write speeds of up to 1050/1000 MB/s, this external SSD ensures swift and efficient data transfer, making it well-suited for tasks such as large file transfers, video editing, and other data-intensive activities.The portable design of the ARES Torch is highly convenient. Its compact size and lightweight build make it easy to carry in a pocket or bag, allowing for on-the-go access to important files and data. This is particularly beneficial for professionals or individuals who need to access their data while away from their main computing devices.The USB 3.2 Gen 2x1 Type C interface not only provides high-speed data transfer but also ensures compatibility with a range of devices. The Type C connector is reversible, offering ease of use and reducing the hassle of figuring out the correct orientation.The 500GB storage capacity strikes a good balance between ample storage space and portability. It's suitable for storing a significant amount of data without sacrificing the convenience of a portable storage solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super small and lightweight, lightning fast!
reviews.reviewText: this little drive is incredibly small and lightweight, but packs a serious performance punch. Over USB-C (using my own cable, rather than the USB-A -> USB-C cable it came with) I was able to pretty closely match the listing claims of 1000MB/sec in transfer speeds. I loaded this drive up with a bunch of 4K footage for a video project, and had no difficulty at all editing everything in real time.At the price point, this is also a good value. If you need a small, lightweight, large capacity and really fast external USB drive, this is a great option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars DATO ARES Torch 500GB Portable External Solid State Drive: Fast, Reliable Storage on the Go
reviews.reviewText: In the digital age, we all need a reliable storage solution to keep our data safe and accessible, and the DATO ARES Torch 500GB Portable External Solid State Drive is here to meet that need. Designed for speed and durability, this sleek external SSD promises to safeguard your data while providing fast, convenient access when you need it.Blazing Fast Speeds:One of the key selling points of the DATO ARES Torch SSD is its impressive speed. With read and write speeds of up to 1050/1000 MB/s, this drive is built for efficiency, making tasks like data transfers, backups, and even running applications feel like a breeze. It connects via USB 3.2 Gen 2x1 Type C for super-fast data transfer rates.Durability and Portability:Built with a solid-state design, the ARES Torch is shock-resistant, protecting your data from accidental drops. Its compact form factor makes it an ideal companion for travelers and professionals who need to take their data with them on the go. The sleek, modern design is not only aesthetically pleasing but also functional, with a heat-dissipating aluminum surface.A Note on Speed:The read and write speeds of around 450MB/s when using the USB 3 connection falls short of the advertised 1050/1000 MB/s. While this may be a concern for those who were expecting peak speeds, the DATO ARES Torch still delivers snappy performance compared to traditional HDDs. I might try a different cable or port to test again.In conclusion, the DATO ARES Torch 500GB Portable External Solid State Drive is an excellent storage solution for those seeking speed, durability, and portability. Whether you're a creative professional, gamer, or simply looking for a reliable way to back up your important files, this external SSD offers great value in a compact package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't let the size fool you
reviews.reviewText: This little solid state drive is amazing. I can take it anywhere. It has a lot of storage and is pretty fast. I transferred 84GB of video from my pc to this Dato Ares storage device in 38 minutes. It is easy to use and most importantly I know it is on a dependable solid state drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Thought SSD would be faster . It is the same as my OLD HDD I upgraded from .
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Very Nice Suprise And So Little!
reviews.reviewText: DATO ARES Torch 500GB Portable External SSD was a big surprise. This thing is just tiny so it's so easy to more around. Plus it's very sturdy and if you drop it, no worries.It's incredibly fast, which is a problem with many portable SSD's since they can be a little slow. This thing is fast making data transfers incredibly easy.With a USB 3.2 Gen 2X1 Type C connection, you will be blown away at how fast this puppy goes. Basically, 1 GB moves in about 1 minute so not too shabby for a portable SSD.A great stocking stuffer gift!
テレビの録画メインはレコーダーを使っていますが、これもテレビに繋いで録画用として使っています。見てすぐ消す番組など、こちらを使う方が便利です。いまのところ問題なく使えています。

reviews.reviewTitle: 小型、バスパワー給電、高速
reviews.reviewText: 現在、データのバックアップに使っているのはバファローの3TBハードディスク。小判書籍ほどの厚みと大きさがあり、アダプターによる給電。そして何より、USB3.0対応ではあっても、読込書込はそれなりに時間がかかります。もう5年程前に購入したものですが、当時は価格もそこそこしました。それに対して本品は、クレジットカードよりも小さなサイズでバスパワー給電、USBケーブルを繋ぐだけで使える上に、HDと比べて圧倒的に読込書込が速い。SSDって、小容量で高価というイメージでしたが、僅か数年のうちにこんなことになっていたのだなぁと驚きました。ただ、少々不思議なのが、同じ製品であっても、1TBより2TBが高価なのは当然として、何故か1TBよりも500GBのほうが高価であることです。残り在庫量や売れ行きによる逆転現象なのかもしれませんが、だったら高い500GBより安い1TB選ぶでしょと思いました。
驚くほど小さくて軽いです。特に問題なくデータ通信出来て、スピードも速いと思います。パソコンのバックアップは勿論、テレビの録画などにも便利です。
軽量コンパクト。サイズ感はフリスクのケースくらいで、小さすぎず失くさない程度の丁度良いサイズ感だと思います。付属のケーブルも10cm程度の短いもので、持ち運びに非常に便利です。モバイルのノートPCは、値段を落とすために本体のストレージを小さくしている機種も多いので、補助ストレージとして大変オススメです。
コンパクトなのに1TBで何の問題無く使用できます。
